infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: AutoSolve allows you to capture photos to help diagnose vehicle issues and document problems.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: AutoSolve may access contacts only if you choose to share diagnostic information.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: AutoSolve may access your calendar to help schedule vehicle maintenance reminders.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AutoSolve may use your location to provide region-specific vehicle information.
